DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSectionPositions
DocAttribute.Documentation: Position coordinate systems in sequentially increasing order paired with _CrossSections_, indicating the position of the corresponding section along the _Directrix_.

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSections
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of cross sections in sequential order along the Directrix

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrespondingSectionPositions
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The set of cross sections and the set of cross section positions shall be of the same size.

DocWhereRule.Name: NoLongitudinalOffsets
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Distance expressions must not use longitudinal offsets.
